<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}

  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"exists":{"type":"boolean"},"id":{"description":"Message Id","type":"string"},"content":{"description":"The message itself","type":"object","properties":{"title":{"description":"Title of the message","type":"string"},"message":{"description":"The message of the message","type":"string"},"writtenBy":{"description":"Id of the member that wrote this message","type":"string"},"writtenFor":{"description":"Id of the member that this message is for","type":"string"},"writtenAt":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date","type":"integer"},"read":{"description":"Whether this message is read or not","type":"boolean"},"supportMarkdown":{"description":"Whether this board message supports markdown","type":"boolean"},"uid":{"description":"The user associated with the message","type":"string"},"lastOperationTime":{"description":"Time in milliseconds since epoch of the last operation on this object","type":"string"}},"title":"boardMessage"}},"title":"boardMessageContatiner"}}}}},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
